body_html: Taking a look now. It sounds like regardless tensorflow should be robust to misbehavior in dask. Perhaps you should keep imports to external and optional dependencies under try-except blocks.
body_text: Taking a look now.  It sounds like regardless tensorflow should be robust to misbehavior in dask.  Perhaps you should keep imports to external and optional dependencies under try-except blocks.
body: Taking a look now.  It sounds like regardless tensorflow should be robust to misbehavior in dask.  Perhaps you should keep imports to external and optional dependencies under try-except blocks.
